title: Veggie Grill with Mary Sasson
itunes:title: Veggie Grill with Mary Sasson
description:
Mary Sasson (Robbie, College Humor) joins the 'boys to discuss D.P. Dough and rowing before a review of Veggie Grill. Plus, another edition of Last Meal.

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.nytimes.com/2021/12/16/opinion/factory-farming-animals.html

https://www.livekindly.co/60-of-all-mammals-on-earth-are-livestock-says-new-study/

https://www.ecowatch.com/biomass-humans-animals-2571413930.html

https://blogs.anderson.ucla.edu/anderson/2016/03/five-lessons-in-entrepreneurship-from-the-founder-of-veggie-grill-.html

https://veggiegrill.com/story/ 

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
